title: Ukraine Response Exposes GOP Foreign Policy Divide
sub_head: Russian invasion spotlights split between Donald Trumpâ€™s approach and a push for more hawkish policies
body:
The crisis in Ukraine has united Republicans around a common argument: President Biden has been too weak.
But beyond criticizing Mr. Biden and broadly pushing for tougher sanctions against Russia, the GOP is divided on how to approach the crisis as it works to define a foreign-policy agenda following costly and unpopular wars in Iraq and Afghanistan and the continued influence of Donald Trump.
